source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 575,914 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 298,927.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

sockets.display_string: +136 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 113,169 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,367 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 194 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
